org.daisy.dotify.api.identity

Interface Identifier


  • public interface Identifier
    Provides an interface for identifying a file format.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AnnotatedFile identify(AnnotatedFile f)
      Identifies the file format of the specified file.

    • Method Detail

      • identify

        AnnotatedFile identify(AnnotatedFile f)
                       throws IdentificationFailedException
        Identifies the file format of the specified file.
        Parameters:
        f - the file to identify
        Returns:
        returns the identified file
        Throws:
        IdentificationFailedException - if identification is unsuccessful
